scripts.bootstrap:deployed: pnpm run build:submodules:deployed && yes | pnpm i --frozen-lockfile --child-concurrency 10 --stream && pnpm run build && yes | pnpm i --frozen-lockfile --prod --child-concurrency 10 --stream
scripts.format:lint: pnpm run format && pnpm run lint
scripts.format:lint:fix: pnpm run format:fix && pnpm run lint:fix
scripts.migrate:create:initial: MIKRO_ORM_PREFER_TS=true dotenvx run -f .env.local -- npx mikro-orm-esm migration:create --initial --config src/nest/storage/postgres/mikro-orm.postgres.config.ts
scripts.migrate:create: MIKRO_ORM_PREFER_TS=true dotenvx run -f .env.local -- npx mikro-orm-esm migration:create --config src/nest/storage/postgres/mikro-orm.postgres.config.ts
scripts.start: pnpm run docker:up && pnpm run migrate:up && dotenvx run -f .env.local -- nest start dist/src --watch
scripts.start:debug: pnpm run migrate:up && pnpm run docker:up && dotenvx run -f .env.local -- nest start dist/src --debug --watch
scripts.spinup:tests: pnpm run -w bootstrap && pnpm run docker:up:test && pnpm run migrate:up:test
scripts.test: pnpm run spinup:tests && NODE_OPTIONS="$NODE_OPTIONS --experimental-vm-modules" dotenvx run -f .env.test -- jest --config ./test/jest.unit.config.ts --runInBand --colors --detectOpenHandles --forceExit --verbose
scripts.test:watch: pnpm run spinup:tests && NODE_OPTIONS="$NODE_OPTIONS --experimental-vm-modules" dotenvx run -f .env.test -- jest --config ./test/jest.unit.config.ts --watch
scripts.test:cov: pnpm run spinup:tests && NODE_OPTIONS="$NODE_OPTIONS --experimental-vm-modules" dotenvx run -f .env.test -- jest --config ./test/jest.unit.config.ts --coverage
scripts.test:debug: pnpm run spinup:tests && NODE_OPTIONS="$NODE_OPTIONS --experimental-vm-modules" dotenvx run -f .env.test -- node --inspect-brk -r  tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/.bin/jest --config ./test/jest.unit.config.ts --runInBand
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm run spinup:tests && IS_E2E=true NODE_OPTIONS="$NODE_OPTIONS --experimental-vm-modules" dotenvx run -f .env.test -- jest --config ./test/jest.e2e.config.ts --runInBand --colors --detectOpenHandles --forceExit --verbose
scripts.test:e2e:ci: pnpm run spinup:tests && IS_E2E=true NODE_OPTIONS="$NODE_OPTIONS --experimental-vm-modules" dotenvx run -f .env.test -- jest --config ./test/jest.e2e.config.ts --runInBand --colors --detectOpenHandles --forceExit --ci --silent --verbose
